patchNotes.title: Talent overhaul and Hero Changes

texts.text: Additional functionality: After hitting 60 heroes, <vanilla, abilities, trait, 0> now refunds 3 charges of <vanilla, abilities, basic, 0>

patchNotes.developerCommentary: Genji is a character that was received with the 'overwatch plague' when high mobility characters launched and within time his mobility or mobility builds were nerfed but on the last patches they created the Tank Genji a version of the character that abuses his trait in combination of some talents to become almost unkillable very often. What i plan here is to decrease how often genji can become tank BUT i want to enforce his mobility in general, he is a high skill cap hero and i don't mind it being extra strong on that perspective if we bring the fun for him and with that i also wanted to viabilize again builds focused on Dragonblade style

changes.name: <vanilla, talents, 7, 2> renamed to Cyber Ninja

texts.text: Additional functionality: While mounted increase the range of <modified, abilities, trait, 0> by 70%
Spell armor duration decreased from 4 to 3 seconds

changes.developerCommentary: A individually strong talent but one who became toxic when paired with <vanilla, talents, 1, 1> cooldown reduction. The objective here is to prevent talent combos that reset <vanilla, abilities, trait, 0>>.

changes.name: <vanilla, talents, 1, 1>
changes.developerCommentary: To better control the other talents i have opt to bring that talent down and mix with the others somehow.

changes.name: <vanilla, talents, 1, 0>

texts.text: Changed functionality: <modified, abilities, trait, 0> can be recast two times within a period of 5 seconds. Genji becomes Unstopabble while jumping

changes.developerCommentary: I wanted to make this talent tier about <modified, abilities, trait, 0> and for that reason my reasoning was to make something that could be more Dragon Blade oriented and Cool ninja stuff as my objective is not just fill Genji gaps but rather give him more funny stuff to do.

changes.name: <vanilla, talents, 1, 2>

texts.text: Additional functionality: While Stealth increases <modified, abilities, trait, 0> refresh rate by 1000%
subtexts: If i did math right, it's supposed to be a 2 second cooldown
Receiving Stealth from other sources will also increase the refresh rate

changes.developerCommentary: With the changes on the other talents from that tier i want to bring that talent closer to rotation purposes but not so eazy to abuse the cooldown on teamfights by attaching it to Stealth. And besides this is NIN-NIN roleplay.

changes.name: <vanilla, talents, 4, 0>
changes.developerCommentary: With the way i want to apply Genji the <modified, abilities, basic, 0> reset would need to be baseline

changes.name: <vanilla, talents, 4, 1>

texts.text: Additional functionality: Increase <modified, abilities, basic, 2> range by 1

changes.developerCommentary: As a talent that works for the tip i would argue that it could perform again like the old times.

changes.name: <vanilla, talents, 20, 2>

texts.text: Won't refund <modified, abilities, basic, 0> charges with <modified, abilities, basic, 2> anymore

changes.developerCommentary: With the way i want to apply Genji the <modified, abilities, basic, 0> reset would need to be baseline

changes.name: <vanilla, talents, 7, 2>
changes.developerCommentary: Changing this tier to be about <modified, abilities, basic, 1> and changing it to a <modified, abilities, trait, 0> tier

changes.name: <vanilla, talents, 16, 0>
changes.developerCommentary: Bringing it here to make it a <modified, abilities, basic, 1> talent tier

changes.name: <vanilla, talents, 16, 0>
changes.developerCommentary: Bringing it to a <modified, abilities, basic, 1> talent tier

changes.name: NEW: Dragon Steel

texts.text: Hitting an enemy hero with <modified, abilities, basic, 2> increase Genji movement speed by 30% and grants a 360 shield for 3 seconds.

changes.developerCommentary: The objective here is to make a safe option to this tier if you wish to go with a Dragon Blade build on

changes.name: <vanilla, talents, 16, 2>

texts.text: Additional functionality: Grants 0.25 seconds of unrevealable stealth for each stack.

changes.developerCommentary: I want to give this talent an appeal without buffing the damage as it leads to conflicts with <modified, talents, 16, 1> as a stat damage competitor with that in mind i want to make it pickable for another reason.

changes.name: <vanilla, talents, 20, 2>
changes.developerCommentary: Bring it to level 4. I sincerely do not think that talent is strong enough to be on level 20 especially with the removal of <vanilla, talents, 4, 0> bonus damage

changes.name: NEW: Ninja Course

texts.text: <modified, abilities, trait, 0> creates a caltrops trap area that lasts 2.5 seconds and deals 65 damage per second on enemies in the area and reduces their armor by 5 for 4 seconds, up to 20
subtexts: Radius is 2 | Malfurion Entangling Roots is 3.0

changes.developerCommentary: I really wanted to give either give smoke bomb or a caltrops ninja trap because Genji is a ninja and ninja things are cool. I wouldn't give him smoke bomb because i alredy implemented smoke bombs similars on other talents.
